Server.Name: House Flipper - Apocalypse Edition
Server.Description: House Flipper: Apocalypse Edition - A curated building and exploration modpack for 7 Days to Die V2.4 (1.0 Stable). Features Include: - SMX UI Suite: Modern interface with integrated MINIMAP for easy navigation - Building Mods: LittleRedSonja plumbing/decor, MPLogue prefabs, and extensive decoration options - Quality of Life: Gears settings framework, Easy Sorter, BeyondStorage2, OcbDensityHoe terrain tools - Vehicle Support: Bobcat Vehicle for efficient material transportation - Starter Support: Grumpee's starter bundles for new players - Verified Configuration: Tested and confirmed working setup from known stable installation Perfect for builders and explorers who want a refined vanilla-plus experience!
Server.ReleaseNotes: Version 2.0.0 - Complete Refactor - Rebuilt from verified working installation - SMX UI Suite 2.3.9.0 with Gears 5.0.1 and Quartz 6.0.1 - Added MPLogue prefab collections (Prefabs v2.0.1, UrbanDecay v1.2.1) - Added trader modifications (No trader rekt v2.0) - Added quality of life mods: BeyondStorage2, Easy Sorter, OcbDensityHoe - Updated LittleRedSonja to v1.0.5 - Optimized load order for stability - All DLLs properly configured in Assemblies folders for V2.4 compatibility
